function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagion hotspots in slums and informal settlements","Impact":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases, higher risk of outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improving living conditions, access to healthcare, and sanitation in slums and informal settlements","Technologies":"Urban planning and design solutions, wastewater treatment technologies","People":"Residents of slums and informal settlements","Owner":"Government, urban planners, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Exacerbation of inequalities and poverty","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases, lack of access to healthcare, and higher transmission rates","Mitigation":"Strengthening social protection, healthcare systems, and addressing economic disparities","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital health solutions, financial inclusion platforms","People":"Marginalized and low-income communities","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Impact of climate change on vulnerable populations","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to disease outbreaks, displacement, and resource scarcity","Mitigation":"Adopting climate-resilient infrastructure, disaster preparedness, and sustainable resource management","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, climate-resilient building materials, early warning systems","People":"Vulnerable communities, displaced populations","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies, and disaster relief organizations"}]}
